At Mon, 15 Aug 2011 21:00:11 +0000,
kiran wrote:
>
> Hey,
>
>           Recently i started installing heritrix in to my operating
> system ubuntu 10.10 and i am following the instructions written over
> here .. http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/install.html
> ....while executing this step  "$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix --help" i am
> getting
>
> "
> /home/kiran/Desktop/heritrix-1.14.4/bin/heritrix: 161: cannot create
> /PATH/TO/BUILT/HERITRIX/heritrix_out.log: Directory
  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Hi Kiran,

HERITRIX_HOME is supposed to be set to a real
directory. /PATH/TO/BUILT/HERITRIX is just an example value.

You should use:

  % export HERITRIX_HOME=/home/kiran/Desktop/heritrix-1.14.4

best, Erik

--Multipart_Mon_Aug_15_15:17:24_2011-1
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII
